about_the_game:
The first historical jousting simulator, running on Unreal Engine 5. Choose an environment and an opponent, and prove your worth in the lists through a physics-based confrontation.

The experience emulates the rules and feel of a joust in the early 1500s, when jousting was at its most popular.

The game is best played with keyboard and mouse. Controllers are supported in the game, but you will need a mouse to navigate the menus.

This experience was created by Vestigia, an independent studio founded by historians and dedicated to producing accurate historical simulations. We want to expand it further and explore many other historical settings. Help us develop a new way to enjoy history!

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 (3.3Ghz) or AMD Ryzen 5 1400 (3.2Ghz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB or AMD Radeon RX 470 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: The first historically accurate jousting simulator, running on Unreal Engine 5. Choose an environment and an opponent, then prove your worth in the lists through a physics-based confrontation adhering to Renaissance-era jousting rules and behaviors.
